resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107804</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107804</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085950</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Children's literature promotes understanding</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur der Kinder fördert zu verstehen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La littérature des enfants favorise 
l'arrangement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A literatura das crianças promove compreender</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La letteratura dei bambini promuove capire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λογοτεχνία των παιδιών προωθεί την κατανόηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La literatura de los niños promueve el entender</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Bibliotherapy and critical literacy are two ways to use books to help children better understand themselves, others, and the world around them. This article explains both strategies and provides resources for selecting appropriate books.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bibliotherapy und kritischer Bildungsgrad sind 
zwei Möglichkeiten, Bücher zu benutzen, um den besseren Kindern zu 
helfen, andere und die Welt um sie sich zu verstehen. Dieser 
Artikel beschreibt beide Strategien und stellt Betriebsmittel für das
Auswählen der passenden Bücher zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bibliotherapy et instruction critique sont deux 
voies d'employer des livres pour aider des enfants meilleurs de se 
comprendre, d'autres, et le monde autour d'eux. Cet article 
explique les deux stratégies et fournit des ressources pour choisir 
les livres appropriés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bibliotherapy e o literacy crítico são duas 
maneiras usar livros ajudar às crianças melhores compreender-se, 
outros, e o mundo em torno delas. Este artigo explica ambas as 
estratégias e fornece recursos selecionando livros apropriados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bibliotherapy ed il literacy critico sono due modi
usare i libri per aiutare i bambini migliori capirsi, altri ed il 
mondo intorno loro. Questo articolo spiega entrambe le strategie
e fornisce le risorse per la selezione dei libri adatti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Bibliotherapy και η κρίσιμη βασική εκπαίδευση 
είναι δύο τρόποι να χρησιμοποιηθούν τα βιβλία για να βοηθήσουν 
τα παιδιά να γίνουν κατανοητός καλύτερα, άλλων, και τον κόσμο 
γύρω από τα. Αυτό το άρθρο εξηγεί και τις δύο στρατηγικές
και παρέχει τα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για την επιλογή των 
κατάλληλων βιβλίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bibliotherapy y la instrucción crítica son dos 
maneras de utilizar los libros para ayudar a los niños mejores 
entenderse, otros, y el mundo alrededor de ellos. Este artículo
explica ambas estrategias y proporciona a los recursos para 
seleccionar los libros apropiados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MELISSA THIBAULT
FN:MELISSA THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107804</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

      <location>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
